summary:
•	Self-starter, creative, driven, tenacious, committed and trusting manager who works diligently to make things happen and exceed expectations regardless of obstacles. 
•	Possesses a unique and strong multi-disciplinary background, demonstrated capabilities to capture and solve challenging problems from a holistic/systematic point of view; while avoiding over complication when a simpler solution is sufficient. 
•	Proven track in developing and implementing effective structural (quality) solutions while first securing containments.
•	Recognized for connecting with internal and external customers, listening to and understanding their needs and effectively aligning all the way.
•	Leading and influencing individuals and organizations to a higher level of maturity while projecting the notion of ownership.  
•	Driven by developing and implementing a strategic vision in a dynamic, complex and uncertain environment. 
Mottos (1)Serving big customers makes you big and  (2) what seems to be at first a devastating problem, could be in fact a precious life changing opportunity if only one focuses on a solution; so let’s think twice.

projects.title: Slim Verbinden
projects.description:
SLIMVERBINDEN
Slim verbinden

In crisissituaties blijkt het nog altijd een probleem om de juiste informatie tijdig bij de juiste personen te krijgen, om adequate besluiten te nemen over het inzetten van hulpverleners. Correcte informatie is ook nodig om schade aan slachtoffers, milieu en economie te beperken of te voorkomen.

Bronbestanden blijven gebruiken

Het is niet de bedoeling om alle informatie die tijdens een crisissituatie nodig kan zijn in één database te plaatsen, om van daaruit de informatie door te geven. Met agent based technology kunnen de eindgebruikers, afhankelijk van de crisissituatie, de op dat moment, benodigde informatie verzamelen uit de oorspronkelijke bronbestanden en doorgeven aan de hulpverlener/besluitvormer.
http://www.participatorysystems.nl/2012/10/slimverbinden/

profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description:
What is Data Science Master at EIT Digital all about?

The newly established Data Science Master’s offers a unique academic programme, whereby students can study data science, innovation, and entrepreneurship at leading European universities. In this programme, students will learn about scalable data collection techniques, data analysis methods, and a suite of tools and technologies that address data capture, processing, storage, transfer, analysis, and visualization, and related concepts (e.g., data access, pricing data, and data privacy).
 
For further information please refer to:

http://www.masterschool.eitdigital.eu/programmes/dsc/
profile_positions.title: Chair of Data Science Master Program

profile_positions.description: Business process modeling is an important part of information systems design as well as of any business engineering or reengineering activity. Business process modeling techniques provide standard ways of presentation and communication between different stakeholders. A business process model is the externalization of the conceptualization of some parts of the object world that deal with those aspects that pertain to the way business transactions are carried out and supported by an information system. My research deals with an essential issue in this context namely, development of frameworks, factors and metrics for understanding and measuring objectively the non-functional requirements (quality) of business processes considering their goals and objectives. This objective raises three major issues, (a) the development of quality evaluation frameworks that are intended to assist business process modellers and analysts to work in a systematic and generic manner when including quality factors in their BPM activities, (b) the identification of a set of key quality factors relevant to business processes and their concepts, and (c) the definition of the metrics that provide a means for objectively and quantitatively measuring quality of business processes and their concepts.
profile_positions.title: PhD Researcher

Field : Business process modeling , business process reengineeering


Mangan Manufacturing Company is a major producer of special machines in Iran for over a quarter of a century. The company is famous for its aim at always manufacturing newly-designed and custom-built equipment and performing unique projects, most of which have been performed for the first time in Iran or the Middle East. The result is 36 turnkey projects which have been accomplished successfully.

profile_positions.description:
The project titled "Designing personnel’s performance measurement system using Balanced Score Card (BSC) for the Personnel of Iran KHODRO company ",leader: Dr.Eshragh, associate professor of industrial faculty of Sharif University of technology
Iran Khodro Co. (IKCO) was founded in 1962, with the name of Iran National. Over the years, IKCO has developed its capabilities and become the biggest industrial group in MENA region that performs industrial and service activities in the automotive sector in both passenger cars and commercial vehicles with 1,000,000 units of production capacity. 
Determined to be a world-class car manufacturer, IKCO founded its own R&D, engine development, and test centers, together with latest technology of production machinery, equipment and facilities, which were established in cooperation with European leading countries in Automotive industry including Germany and France. 
With the aim of global market presence and developing an international brand approach export has been considered as the main policy of IKCO. Since 2002 the policy plays a key role in capturing global market share by the company.
profile_positions.title: Team member of a research project
